{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Arial;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue255;} {\stylesheet{ Normal;}{\s1 heading 1;}} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2510;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\sb240\sa60\qc\kerning28\b\f0\fs32 End User Software License to Use Agreement\par \pard\kerning0\b0\fs24\par \pard\sb60\sa144\fs18 By installing or using this Highlands Electronics LLC product (the \ldblquote RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE\rdblquote ) you indicate your agreement to the terms of this License Agreement. If you do not agree to the terms herein, you are not authorized to copy or use the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE. The RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE, including all images, photographs, icons and text incorporated in the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE, is owned by the Highlands Electronics LLC or its suppliers and is protected by United States copyright laws and international treaty provisions. Except to the extent expressly licensed herein, all rights are reserved to the Highlands Electronics LLC and its suppliers. You may not reverse engineer, decompile or disassemble the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE.\par ATTENTION: USE OF THE RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE IS SUBJECT TO THE TERMS SET FORTH BELOW. USING THE RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE INDICATES YOUR ACCEPTANCE OF THESE TERMS. IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THESE TERMS YOU ARE NOT AUTHORIZED TO USE THIS RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 1.\tab LICENSE GRANT\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 The Highlands Electronics LLC grants you a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide right and license to use the executable version of the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE, where \ldblquote use\rdblquote in this Agreement means storing, loading, installing or executing the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE. You may not modify the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE or disable any licensing or control features of the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE. You agree that you may not copy the written materials accompanying the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE. You may assign your rights under this Agreement to a third party who agrees in writing to be bound by this Agreement prior to the assignment and provided that you transfer all copies of the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE and related documentation to the third party or destroy any copies not transferred. Except as set forth above, you may not assign your rights under this Agreement.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 2.\tab OWNERSHIP\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 All right, title and interest in and to the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE is owned and copyrighted by the Highlands Electronics LLC or its third party suppliers. Your license confers neither title to nor ownership in the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE and is not a sale of any rights in the Highlands Electronics LLC. The Highlands Electronics LLC third party suppliers may protect their rights in the event of any violation of this License Agreement as if such suppliers were parties to this License Agreement. No license is given to you under any patent or patent application of the Highlands Electronics LLC.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 3.\tab COPIES AND ADAPTATIONS\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 Other than as provided in the License Grant section of this agreement, you may only make copies or adaptations of the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE for archival purposes or when copying or adaptation is an essential step in the authorized use of the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE. You must reproduce all copyright notices in the original RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE on all copies or adaptations.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 4.\tab NO DISASSEMBLY, RECOMPILATION OR DECRYPTION\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 You may not disassemble or decompile the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE unless prior written consent is obtained from the Highlands Electronics LLC. In some jurisdictions, Highlands Electronics LLC consent may not be required for limited disassembly or decompilation. Upon request, you will provide the Highlands Electronics LLC with reasonably detailed information regarding any disassembly or decompilation. You may not decrypt the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE unless decryption is an essential step in the authorized use of the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 5.\tab NO WARRANTIES\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, the Highlands Electronics LLC expressly disclaims any warranty for the product. The product and any related documentation is provided \ldblquote as is\rdblquote without warranty of any kind, either express or implied, including without limitation, the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and noninfringement of third party proprietary rights. The entire risk arising out of use or performance of the product remains with you.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 6.\tab NO LIABILITY FOR DAMAGES\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, neither the Highlands Electronics LLC nor its suppliers shall be liable for any incidental, special or consequential damages whatsoever (including without limitation, damages for loss of business profit, business interruption, loss of business information, or any other pecuniary loss) arising out of or relating to the use or inability to use this product, even if the Highlands Electronics LLC has been advised of the possibility of such damages. Because some states/jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of liability for consequential or incidental damages, the above limitation may not apply to you. Furthermore, the Highlands Electronics LLC\rquote s liability for direct damages shall not exceed the license fee, if any, paid by you for use of the product.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b\par 7.\tab CUSTOMER REMEDIES\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 Your exclusive remedy shall be, at the Highlands Electronics LLC\rquote s option, repair or replacement of the product. There will be no refund of part or all of the license fee, if any, paid by you for the product.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 8.\tab TERMINATION\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 This Agreement shall continue for the duration of the Highlands Electronics LLC\rquote s copyright in the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE, unless earlier terminated as provided herein. The Highlands Electronics LLC may terminate your license immediately upon notice to you from the Highlands Electronics LLC for your failure to comply with any of the terms set forth in this Agreement. Upon termination, you must immediately destroy the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE, together with all copies, adaptations and merged portions thereof in any form.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 9.\tab EXPORT REQUIREMENTS\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 You may not export or re-export the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE or any copy or adaptation in violation of any applicable laws or regulations.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 10.\tab U.S. GOVERNMENT RESTRICTED RIGHTS \par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 The RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE and any accompanying documentation have been developed entirely at private expense. They are delivered and licensed as \ldblquote commercial computer software.\rdblquote If this RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE is acquired under the terms of a DOD or civilian agency contract, use, reproduction or disclosure of the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE by the Government is subject to the restrictions set forth in this License Agreement in accordance with 48 C.F.R. 227.7202 or 48 C.F.R. 12.212, respectively.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 11.\tab NEGATION OF PARTNERSHIP\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 The Highlands Electronics LLC shall not become or be deemed a partner or a joint venturer with you by reason of the provisions of this license.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 12.\tab GOVERNING LAW AND FORUM\par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 Irrespective of the place of execution or performance, this License Agreement shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Arizona applicable to agreements made and to be performed by State residents entirely within the State of Arizona. Any litigation to enforce or interpret the provisions of this License Agreement or the parties\rquote rights or obligations arising out of this License Agreement or the performance hereunder shall be maintained only in the courts in the county of Apache, Arizona and the parties expressly consent to personal jurisdiction in such courts. The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods is specifically disclaimed.\par \pard\s1\sb60\sa144\b 13.\tab ENTIRE AGREEMENT \par \pard\sb60\sa144\b0 Unless otherwise expressly agreed in writing, this License Agreement constitutes the sole and exclusive agreement between you and the Highlands Electronics LLC with regard to the RESERVE ANALYST SOFTWARE, and supersedes all prior agreements, whether oral or written, and other communications between the parties relating to the subject matter set forth herein.\par If you have any questions regarding this License Agreement or if you wish to request any information from the Highlands Electronics LLC, please contact the firm at the address below or via e-mail at:\par \pard\b Highlands Electronics LLC\par P.O. Box 3354\par Clearlake, CA 95422\par Phone: 800-561-0173\par Fax: 888-391-9267\par E-mail: Marketing@ReserveAnalyst.com\par Web Site: {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "www.ReserveAnalyst.com"}}{\fldrslt{\ul\cf1 www.ReserveAnalyst.com}}}\f0\fs18\par \fs24\par }
